snippet: Two members of a family that the authorities say once tried to set up a whites-only nation were arrested this week on firearms charges after a raid on a 40-acre ranch.
abstract: Kirby Kehoe and his son Cheyne, two members of family that authorities say once tried to set up a whites-only nation, are arrested on firearms charges after raid on Arizona 40-acre ranch netted dozens of weapons and thousands of rounds of ammunition; men have previous felony convictions and are banned from possessing firearms.
lead_paragraph: Two members of a family that the authorities say once tried to set up a whites-only nation were arrested this week on firearms charges after a raid on a 40-acre ranch.

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
keywords.name: organizations
